title: FBI Locates Suspect After Warning of Security Threat at NJ Synagogues
description: Officials said the man holds “radical extremist views.” On Thursday, they had alerted congregations across the state to be on alert.
dc:creator: Tracey Tully and Shlomo Schorr
media:description: Police officers stand watch outside the United Synagogue of Hoboken, N.J., on Thursday.
